debates.showAs: Local Government (Support for Elected Members) Bill 2024: Second Stage
Local Government (Support for Elected Members) Bill 2024: Second Stage (Resumed)
Local Government (Support for Elected Members) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide administrative support for elected members of local authorities to assist in the performance of their duties; to amend the Local Government Act 2001; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do sholáthar tacaíocht riaracháin do chomhaltaí tofa d’údaráis áitiúla chun cúnamh a thabhairt maidir lena ndualgais a chomhlíonadh; do leasú an Achta Rialtais Áitiúil, 2001; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Local Government (Support for Elected Members) Bill 2024
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Rialtais Áitiúil (Tacaíocht do Chomhaltaí Tofa), 2024

debates.showAs: National Minimum Wage (Adequate Wages for Living) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled An Act to amend the National Minimum Wage Act 2000 to provide for implementation of Directive (EU) 2022/2041 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 19 October 2022 on adequate minimum wages in the European Union.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Pá Íosta Náisiúnta, 2000 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le Treoir (AE) 2022/2041 ó Pharlaimint na hEorpa agus ón gComhairle an 19 Deireadh Fómhair 2022 maidir le pá íosta leordhóthanach san Aontas Eorpach a chur i ngníomh.
bill.shortTitleEn: National Minimum Wage (Adequate Wages for Living) Bill 2024
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Pá Íosta Náisiúnta (Pá Leordhóthanach chun Maireachtála), 2024

debates.showAs: Parole (Special Advocates) Bill 2024: Second Stage
Parole (Special Advocates) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Parole Act 2019 to provide for the appointment of special advocates to represent the interests of relevant applicants in certain cases before the Parole Board, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Parúil, 2019 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le haighní speisialta a cheapadh chun bheith ionadaitheach do leasanna iarratasóirí iomchuí i gcásanna áirithe atá os comhair an Bhoird Parúil, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Air Navigation and Transport (Arms Embargo) Bill 2024: Order for Committee Stage
Air Navigation and Transport (Arms Embargo) Bill 2024: Committee Stage
Air Navigation and Transport (Arms Embargo) Bill 2024: Second Stage
Air Navigation and Transport (Arms Embargo) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for restrictions on the transit and export of weapons of war from and through the State to the state of Israel and to provide for appropriate inspections of planes seeking to transit weapons through the State, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le srianta ar thrasghluaiseacht agus onnmhairiú arm cogaidh as an Stát, agus tríd an Stát, chuig stát Iosrael agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le hiniúchtaí cuí ar eitleáin lena bhféachfar le hairm a thrasghluaiseacht tríd an Stát, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Air Navigation and Transport (Arms Embargo) Bill 2024
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Aerloingseoireachta agus Aeriompair (Lánchosc Arm), 2024

debates.showAs: Disability (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2023: Report and Final Stages
Disability (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2023: Committee Stage
Disability (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2023: Second Stage
Disability (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Disability Act 2005 and the Equal Status Act 2000 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Míchumas, 2005 agus an Achta um Stádas Comhionann, 2000 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Climate Action and Biodiversity (Mandates of Certain Organisations) Bill 2023: Second Stage
Climate Action and Biodiversity (Mandates of Certain Organisations) Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Turf Development Act 1946 and the Forestry Act 1988 in order to reflect obligations regarding climate action and the protection and enhancement of biodiversity in the mandate and functions of the organisations established under those Acts.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Forbartha Móna, 1946 agus an Achta Foraoiseachta, 1988 d’fhonn oibleagáidí, maidir le gníomhú ar son na haeráide agus maidir leis an mbithéagsúlacht a chosaint agus a fheabhsú, a léiriú i mandáid agus i bhfeidhmeanna na n-eagraíochtaí a bunaíodh faoi na hAchtanna sin.
bill.shortTitleEn: Climate Action and Biodiversity (Mandates of Certain Organisations) Bill 2023
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Ghníomhú Aeráide agus um Bithéagsúlacht (Mandáidí Eagraíochtaí Áirithe), 2023

debates.showAs: Electoral Reform (Amendment) and Electoral (Amendment) Bill 2023: Second Stage
Electoral Reform (Amendment) and Electoral (Amendment) Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Electoral Reform Act 2022 to provide in the functions of An Coimisiún Toghcháin for the review of the electoral system and franchise for Seanad Éireann, and to provide in the functions of An Coimisiún Toghcháin for the review of voting age; to amend the Electoral Act 1997 to protect the right to freedom of association and expression for civil society organisations in Ireland, and to provide for free public transport on polling day; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Athchóiriú Toghcháin, 2022 chun socrú a dhéanamh i bhfeidhmeanna an Choimisiúin Toghcháin, maidir le hathbhreithniú a dhéanamh ar an gcóras toghcháin agus ar an toghchóras do Sheanad Éireann, agus do dhéanamh socrú, i bhfeidhmeanna an Choimisiúin Toghcháin, maidir le hathbhreithniú a dhéanamh ar an aois vótála; do leasú an Achta Toghcháin, 1997 chun an ceart chun saoirse comhlachais agus saoirse chun tuairimí a nochtadh a chosaint i gcomhair eagraíochtaí na sochaí sibhialta in Éirinn, agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le hiompar poiblí saor in aisce ar an lá vótaíochta; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Athchóiriú Toghcháin (Leasú) agus um Thoghchán (Leasú), 2023

debates.showAs: Electoral Reform (Amendment) and Miscellaneous Provisions Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Electoral Reform Act 2022 to provide in the functions of An Coimisiún Toghcháin for the review of the electoral system and franchise for Seanad Éireann, and to provide in the functions of An Coimisiún Toghcháin for the review of voting age; to amend the Electoral Act 1997 to protect the right to freedom of association and expression for civil society organisations in Ireland, and to provide for free public transport on polling day; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Athchóiriú Toghcháin, 2022 chun socrú a dhéanamh i bhfeidhmeanna an Choimisiúin Toghcháin, maidir le hathbhreithniú a dhéanamh ar an gcóras toghcháin agus ar an toghchóras do Sheanad Éireann, agus do dhéanamh socrú, i bhfeidhmeanna an Choimisiúin Toghcháin, maidir le hathbhreithniú a dhéanamh ar an aois vótála; do leasú an Achta Toghcháin, 1997 chun an ceart chun saoirse comhlachais agus saoirse chun tuairimí a nochtadh a chosaint i gcomhair eagraíochtaí na sochaí sibhialta in Éirinn, agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le hiompar poiblí saor in aisce ar an lá vótaíochta; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Electoral Reform (Amendment) and Miscellaneous Provisions Bill 2023
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Athchóiriú Toghcháin (Leasú) agus Forálacha Ilghnéitheacha, 2023

debates.showAs: Institutional Burials (Amendment) Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Institutional Burials Act 2022 to enable the Director of Authorised Intervention to engage in cases where precise burial places cannot be identified but where inappropriate burials are likely to have taken place in an institutional setting, to provide for cases where persons who consider that they are related to persons thought to be buried on principal burial land indicate that an excavation of the land is their preference, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Adhlacthaí Forais, 2022 chun a chumasú don Stiúrthóir um Idirghabháil Údaraithe gabháil do chásanna nach féidir áiteanna beachta adhlactha a chéannú ach inar dóigh gur tharla adhlacthaí míchuí i suíomh forais, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cásanna ina léiríonn daoine a mheasann go bhfuil siad gaolta le daoine a cheaptar a bheith adhlactha i bpríomhthalamh adhlactha gurb é a rogha é go ndéanfar an talamh a thochailt, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Child Trafficking and Child Sexual Exploitation Material (Amendment) Bill 2022: Report Stage
Child Trafficking and Child Sexual Exploitation Material (Amendment) Bill 2022: Committee Stage
Child Trafficking and Child Sexual Exploitation Material (Amendment) Bill 2022: Second Stage
Child Trafficking and Child Sexual Exploitation Material (Amendment) Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the title of the Child Trafficking and Pornography Act 1998 whereafter, following commencement of this Act, the Act of 1998 shall be titled the “Child Trafficking and Child Sexual Abuse Material Act 1998”(Amendment); to amend the title of the Child Trafficking and Pornography (Amendment) Act 2004 whereafter, following commencement of this Act, the Act of 2004 shall be titled the “Child Trafficking and Child Sexual Exploitation Material (Amendment) Act 2004”; to substitute the term “Child Pornography” with “Child Sexual Exploitation Material” within those Acts and other Acts.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú theideal an Achta um Gháinneáil ar Leanaí agus Pornagrafaíocht Leanaí, 1998 chun gurb é teideal Acht 1998, tar éis thosach feidhme an Achta seo, “An tAcht um Gháinneáil ar Leanaí agus Ábhar a bhaineann le Drochúsáid Ghnéasach Leanaí 1998”(Leasú); do leasú theideal an Achta um Gháinneáil ar Leanaí agus Pornagrafaíocht Leanaí (Leasú), 2004 chun gurb é teideal Acht 2004, tar éis thosach feidhme an Achta seo, “An tAcht um Gháinneáil ar Leanaí agus Ábhar a bhaineann le Teacht i dTír Gnéasach ar Leanaí (Leasú), 2004”; do chur an téarma “Ábhar a bhaineann le Teacht i dTír Gnéasach ar Leanaí” in ionad an téarma “Pornagrafaíocht Leanaí” sna hAchtanna sin agus in Achtanna eile.
bill.shortTitleEn: Child Trafficking and Child Sexual Exploitation Material (Amendment) Bill 2022
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Gháinneáil ar Leanaí agus Ábhar a bhaineann le Teacht i dTír Gnéasach ar Leanaí (Leasú), 2022

debates.showAs: Safe Access to Termination of Pregnancy Services Bill 2021: Report and Final Stages
Safe Access to Termination of Pregnancy Services Bill 2021: Committee Stage
Safe Access to Termination of Pregnancy Services Bill 2021: Second Stage
Safe Access to Termination of Pregnancy Services Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to protect the free and unencumbered access to facilities providing legal termination of pregnancy services; protect individuals providing or facilitating legal termination of pregnancy services from harassment; and to provide for matters connected therewith.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun rochtain gan bhac gan chonstaic ar shaoráidí a sholáthraíonn seirbhísí foirceanta toirchis dlíthiúla a chosaint; chun daoine a sholáthraíonn nó a éascaíonn seirbhísí foirceanta toirchis dlíthiúla a chosaint ar chiapadh; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe a bhaineann leis an méid sin.
bill.shortTitleEn: Safe Access to Termination of Pregnancy Services Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Rochtain Shábháilte ar Sheirbhísí Foirceanta Toirchis, 2021

debates.showAs: Companies (Emission Reporting) Bill 2021: Second Stage
Companies (Emission Reporting) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to require companies to make annual public disclosures in relation to the greenhouse gas emissions caused by their activities, to cause decreases in such emissions over time, to amend the Climate Action and Low Carbon Development Act 2015 and the Companies Act 2014, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht dá cheangal ar chuideachtaí nochtaí poiblí bliantúla a dhéanamh i ndáil leis na hastaíochtaí gás ceaptha teasa arb iad a ngníomhaíochtaí is cúis leo, do chur faoi deara laghduithe a dhéanamh ar na hastaíochtaí sin le himeacht aimsire, do leasú an Achta um Ghníomhú Aeráide agus um Fhorbairt Ísealcharbóin, 2015 agus Acht na gCuideachtaí, 2014, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Land and Conveyancing Law Reform (Amendment) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Land and Conveyancing Law Reform Act 2009 to provide for an amendment to section 38 of the same Act to extend the period for the registration of easements and profits à prendre.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Athchóiriú an Dlí Talún agus Tíolactha, 2009 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le leasú a dhéanamh ar alt 38 den Acht céanna chun an tréimhse chun éasúintí agus profits à prendre a chlárú a fhadú.
bill.shortTitleEn: Land and Conveyancing Law Reform (Amendment) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Athchóiriú an Dlí Talún agus Tíolactha (Leasú), 2021

debates.showAs: Employment Equality (Amendment) (Non-Disclosure Agreements) Bill 2021: Report and Final Stages [Private Members]
Employment Equality (Amendment) (Non-Disclosure Agreements) Bill 2021: Committee Stage
Employment Equality (Amendment) (Non-Disclosure Agreements) Bill 2021: Second Stage
Employment Equality (Amendment) (Non-Disclosure Agreements) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to restrict the use of non-disclosure agreements as they relate to incidents of workplace sexual harassment and discrimination.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do chur srian le húsáid comhaontuithe neamhnochta mar a bhaineann siad le teagmhais ghnéaschiaptha agus idirdhealaithe san áit oibre.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chomhionannas Fostaíochta (Leasú) (Comhaontuithe Neamhnochta), 2021

debates.showAs: Quality in Public Procurement (Contract Preparation and Award Criteria) Bill 2021: Report and Final Stages
Quality in Public Procurement (Contract Preparation and Award Criteria) Bill 2021: Order for Committee Stage
Quality in Public Procurement (Contract Preparation and Award Criteria) Bill 2021: Committee Stage
Quality in Public Procurement (Contract Preparation and Award Criteria) Bill 2021: Second Stage
Quality in Public Procurement (Contract Preparation and Award Criteria) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to give further effect to Directive 2014/24/EU of the European Parliament and of the Council of 26 February 2014 and for that purpose to provide for contract award criteria in public contracts, to promote the use of social considerations and the best price-quality ratio and to establish a procedure for departing from best price-quality ratio, to ensure that section 3 of the European Convention on Human Rights Act 2003 applies to every contracting authority to which the said Directive relates in respect of a contract equal to or greater than a determinable monetary threshold, to provide for the issuing of guidelines concerning social considerations, to require annual reporting to each House of the Oireachtas concerning certain matters and to provide for matters connected therewith.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do thabhairt tuilleadh éifeachta do Threoir 2014/24/AE ó Pharlaimint na hEorpa agus ón gComhairle an 26 Feabhra 2014 agus, chun na críche sin, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le critéir dámhachtana conarthaí i gconarthaí poiblí, do chur úsáid cúinsí sóisialta agus an chóimheasa is fearr idir praghas agus cáilíocht chun cinn agus do bhunú nós imeachta le haghaidh imeacht ón gcóimheas is fearr idir praghas agus cáilíocht, dá chinntiú go mbeidh feidhm ag alt 3 den Acht fán gCoinbhinsiún Eorpach um Chearta an Duine, 2003 maidir le gach údarás conarthach lena mbaineann an Treoir sin i leith conradh atá comhionann le tairseach airgid inchinnte nó is mó ná sin, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le treoirlínte a bhaineann le cúinsí sóisialta a eisiúint, dá cheangal tuairisciú bliantúil a dhéanamh do gach Teach den Oireachtas maidir le nithe áirithe agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe a bhaineann leis an méid sin.
bill.shortTitleEn: Quality in Public Procurement (Contract Preparation and Award Criteria) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Cháilíocht i Sainfháil Phoiblí (Conarthaí a Ullmhú agus Critéir Dhámhachtana), 2021

debates.showAs: Deportation Moratorium (Covid-19) Bill 2020: Second Stage
Deportation Moratorium (Covid-19) Bill 2020: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to prohibit the deportation of persons from the State during the public health emergency posed by the spread of Covid-19 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do thoirmeasc daoine a ionnarbadh as an Stát le linn na héigeandála sláinte poiblí de dheasca Covid-19 a bheith ag leathadh agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Moratóir ar Ionnarbadh (Covid-19), 2020
